title: Aamir Khan is not working on ‘Lagaan’ sequel
text: Aamir Khan is not working on ‘Lagaan’ sequel Sunday, 25 October 2015 (14 minutes ago) Superstar Aamir Khan is reportedly not working on the sequel of Oscar nominated sports-drama "Lagaan". Lagaan revolved around a small village where the locals oppressed by high tax rates, found themselves in an extraordinary situation. Thereafter, an arrogant... Filmy Friday 2 hours ago - Entertainment "It is completely false news (Aamir working on the sequel). It is not true at all," sources said. DNA 16 hours ago - Entertainment Aamir Khan will not be working on the sequel of 'Lagaan' Zee News 16 hours ago - Lifestyle The industry grapevine is abuzz with rumours about Aamir Khan contemplating taking forward the story of his 2001 epic sports drama, 'Lagaan' with a new director...
